endDateExclusive.description: <llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `endDateExclusive` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/input/properties/timePeriod/properties/endDateExclusive" in the list of pointers.
